Uses of Interface
Hexxagon.Controller.IPlayer

  • Packages that use IPlayer 
    Package Description
    Hexxagon.Controller
    Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed to implement the controller layer of Hexxagon module.
    Hexxagon.Model
    Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed to implement the model layer of Hexxagon module.

    • Uses of IPlayer in Hexxagon.Controller

      Subinterfaces of IPlayer in Hexxagon.Controller 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IAIPlayer
      Contains method specifications of artificial player.
      Classes in Hexxagon.Controller that implement IPlayer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AIPlayer
      Contains methods of an artificial player.
      class  HumanPlayer
      Contains methods of a non-artificial player.
      class  Player
      Contains generalised methods of all possible type of players in controller layer.
      Methods in Hexxagon.Controller that return IPlayer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IPlayer GameController.fabricateAutoPlayer(String playerColor)
      Creates an artificial player.
      static IPlayer GameController.fabricateGamePlayer(String playerColor)
      Creates a player.
      static IPlayer GameController.fabricateGamePlayer(String playerColor, byte playerIndex)
      Creates a player.
      static IPlayer GameController.fabricateHumanPlayer(String playerColor)
      Creates a human player.

      Fields in Hexxagon.Model with type parameters of type IPlayer 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ArrayList<IPlayer> GamePlay.playerList
      List of the player instances participate in the game.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IPlayer GameData.getPlayer(byte playerIndex)
      Retrieves the player object of specified player.
      IPlayer IGameData.getPlayer(byte playerIndex)
      Retrieves the player object of specified player.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
